<Heading
  as={"h1"}

  children={"Setup 2fa"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/account/two-factor"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns two-factor token credentials that allow a user to configure
it on their account. If two-factor is already enabled this endpoint
will return a 400 error.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}

>
  
</StatusCodes>
